channel.title: Adding/making server npc reset command plz help!
channel.description:
I was wondering if anybody can help me adding a server npc reset that everytime i do a command like for example ::npcreset or ::resetnpc then it does so...can some1 telll me code or site or sumthin plz help!
Sincerest Regards, Soeib

item.title: Adding/making server npc reset command plz help!
item.dc:creator: @Zach_93 Zach 93
item.description:
@Zach_93 wrote:

if (command.equals("resetnpc") && playerRights >= 1) {
	for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) {
		if (npcs[i] != null) {
			npcs[i].isDead = true;
		}
	}
}

::resetnpc, moderators or higher may use it. If your NPCs are in autospawn they will re-appear on their own.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding/making server npc reset command plz help!

im trying to add it and what im saying is if anybody could make code for me…or if their server has it if they could just copy and paste…thanks
